pull.title: build: fix qt distdir builds (retry)
pull.body:
Retrying #9509.

The actual issue seems to be that the source files aren't found when creating the distdir. Ideally we'd get rid of the wildcard and just enumerate all files. But this seems to work too.

(Hopefully) fixes the issue presented by #9416.

milestone.description: Milestone for Bitcoin Core 0.13.3 (used for branch maintenance and does not imply a release)

events.message: build: fix for out-of-tree/distdir qt builds

events.body: This is a follow up of #8133, thus should be backported. Correct me if I am wrong.

issue.title: travis: make distdir before make
issue.body: Fix my nit on my pull: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/9390#discussion_r93356812
